attributes.title: Please remove
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get more involved in politics and suddenly my phone started making these awful noises causing all my fingernails to fall off. I also lost the ability to read and form sentences, I had to have my mom type this for me. I wish it never existed.

attributes.title: No no no no no no no no no no no no no no
attributes.review: Just please no no no no no no no please i beg of you just delete the app

attributes.review: i was very excited to see what our great orange cheeto president was up too but this app was very disappointing 😿 please delete

attributes.title: TRUMP 2020 IN A PRISON CELL
attributes.review: As the political 13 year old I am, Trump is a racist, misogynistic,homophobic, and xenophobic orange. He is also sexual attracted to his DAUGHTER (invanka). There is many evidence pointing to him sexualizing young girls along with being BEST friends with Eipstein. I Can’t believe old southern racist white ppl actually support this orange, unbelievable. Anyways Settle for Biden 2020😻😻😻✨👁👅👁

attributes.title: Sad
attributes.review: Downloading this app was, by far, the worst decision i have ever made. Upon downloading, it immediately hacked my phone and deleted all other apps I had downloaded. It was almost as empty as Trump's Tulsa Rally... 😞😣😫😭😢👎👁👄👁💔

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: I tried to register for a rally, and it let me! horrible!

attributes.title: Literally made my dad die
attributes.review: After getting this app on his phone, my dad could not handle the sheer stupidity and had a 3rd degree brain aneurism killing him almost instantly. His last words to be were “Don’t let trump win the election” please for the safety of yourself don’t download this app, and to honor my late father please don’t let trump win the election.
